bug.short_desc: context menu in table is broken

long_desc.thetext: Method _onContextMenu in qx.ui.table.pane.Scroller.js does not fire the "cellContextmenu" Event when a cell is right-clicked and therefore will not display a user-generated context-menu. When right-clicking the "empty-filler-column" on the right of the table it works as expected. Source of the problem seems to be that the Property __lastMouseDownCell in qx.ui.table.pane.Scroller.js is empty. This Bug was reproduced with Firefox 2, 3, 3.5, ie7, ie8, Google Chrome 2 and Safari 4 on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 using the demobrowser (table-tableContextMenu) on 3 different machines. As the problem did not appear during test with 2 linux machines, its most likely windows-only. the bug also appears in the 0.8.3 demobrowser
@Fabian, maybe related to your latest work on context menu events?
